document.full_text: a woman who fled to nigeria now faces four manslaughter counts in the deaths of four children who died in a fire at her day care center in houston.
document.title: day care owner who fled after fire killed 4 is flown back to u.s.
lines_and_colors: a woman who fled to nigeria now faces four manslaughter counts in the deaths of four children who died in a fire at her day care center in houston.
